ehotel.inter
Interface AMDMod

public interface AMDMod

AMDCntMod interface supply functions to manipulate database in Conent-MOD side.

Since:
SDK1.6
Version:
ehotel2.0
Author:
hoavk@elcom.com.vn

Method Detail

addSubject

int addSubject(Subject subject,
               int parentId)
addCntSubject : create a new subject for conent side

Parameters:
subject - A new subject name to add to the system
parentId - the level of subject in tree
Returns:
return sequence value which save in database.if the subject is completely added.-1 otherwise.

removeSubject

int removeSubject(int subjId)
remove a subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to remove
Returns:
true if the subject is completely removed. false otherwise.

editSubject

int editSubject(Subject subject,
                int langId)
update information of subject

Parameters:
subject - A sequence of the desired subject. *
langId - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
return 1 if the subject is completely updated. -1 is duplicate name otherwise.

getSubjectInfo

Subject getSubjectInfo(int subjId,
                       int langid)
get detail information of a subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to get info
langid - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
Subject. The object contain entire subject information (such as id,name,urlimage). May be is null.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException , java.lang.NullPointerException

removeMods

                   java.lang.String str_modId)
remove songs from a subject in service side.

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject
str_modId - Start brackets '(' and ending ')'. The modId comma separated such as format (modId1,modId2,modId3)
Returns:

java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException

                           java.lang.String newSubjId)
change song from this subject to another subjects.

Parameters:
modId - A sequence of the desired song.
newSubjId - Start brackets '(' and ending ')'. The subjId comma separated such as (subjId1,subjId2,subjId3)
Returns:
true if the value is completely changed. false otherwise.

updateMod

boolean updateMod(Mod mod,
                  int langid)
update information of song

Parameters:
mod - The object contain entire song information (such as title,singer,director,composer,lyric). Should not be null
langid - Data is updated in database by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
true if the song is completely updated. false otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException

                              int langid,

                              int ttoRow)

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject.
langid - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
fromRow - Begining data is fromRow
ttoRow - Ending data is ttoRow
Returns:
Vector empty if there is no song in the subject. Vector otherwise.

countModOfSubject

int countModOfSubject(int subjId)
count song in the subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject.
Returns:
0 if there is no song in the subject. value greater than 0 otherwise.
